title: Roadmap to Ending Extinction
description: Exhibition design for AIR COMPANY Innovation Summit
credits: As part of Random Studio for Air Company
lede: On the occasion of Climate Week, Random Studio translated the ethos of AIR COMPANY into a spatial journey  introducing the company over the course of one night.

text.heading: Insight
text.text: Founded in 2019, Air Company is devoted to converting carbon waste into sustainable fuel through carbon utilisation technology. The event ‘Roadmap to Ending Extinction’ during New York Climate week needed to synthesise a wealth of complex information and research into a comprehensive experience.
